'''''Vinyar Tengwar 39''''' is the thirty-ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|38|40}}

==Contents==
* E.L.F. News

* "From ''[[Quendi and Eldar]]'', Appendix D"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter
* "''[[Ósanwe-kenta]]'': 'Enquiry into the Communication of Thought'"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
